item.title: guacd Deprecation Notice
item.description:
Due to a lack of upstream support for modern dependencies, we are deprecating our guacd container.

We recommend switching to their official container, though please note this only offers support for amd64 platforms.
item.content:
Due to a lack of upstream support for modern dependencies, we are deprecating our guacd container.

We recommend switching to their official container, though please note this only offers support for amd64 platforms.

item.title: New Container: Guacd
item.description:
We have released a new container for Guacd!

Guacd - Apache Guacamole is a clientless remote desktop gateway. It supports standard protocols like VNC, RDP, and SSH. This container is only the backend server component needed to use The official or 3rd party HTML5 frontends.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Guacd!

Guacd - Apache Guacamole is a clientless remote desktop gateway. It supports standard protocols like VNC, RDP, and SSH. This container is only the backend server component needed to use The official or 3rd party HTML5 frontends.
